Articles.Content:
Hi Guys, I can't start KSP. The only thing I know is that the .cfg files are the problem. Loading stops everytime when it reaches a .cfg file.

 I'm playing KSP with these mods:

PortalCoreBattery                               https://mods.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/264042-portal-core-battery

TextureReplacer                                  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/96851-11-texturereplacer-2413-442016/

RealSolarSystem master                    https://github.com/KSP-RO/RealSolarSystem/tree/master/Source

Kopernicus-1.3.0-4                              http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/140580-130-122-kopernicus-release-4-june-15/ 

Custom.Asteroids v1.3.1 ksp 1.1.0-1  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/72785-13x-custom-asteroids-150-may-29/             

KSC_Switcher-0.7                               https://github.com/KSP-RO/KSCSwitcher/releases

And this Textures:

2048                            https://github.com/KSP-RO/RSS-Textures/releases

8192                            https://github.com/KSP-RO/RSS-Textures/releases

4096                            https://github.com/KSP-RO/RSS-Textures/releases

My System:

Windows 7 Professional  64 bit

CPU:  AMD Athlon(tm) X4 880K Quad Core Processor 4.20GHz

GPU:  GTX 960

RAM:  4 GB (I know that's not much)

And thats it. Thank you for your help.

 

Edited July 31, 2017 by Lars_und_so
unorganized :D

Moved post to Technical Support (Modded)

 

So, am I reading correctly that you have all three resolutions of texture packs in your game data? You're only supposed to pick one of those, from what I remember. And you probably shouldn't be using the 8192 pack as it is very intensive.

Seeing that you only have 4GB of RAM, I recommend that you use the 2048 textures.

And make sure you are using the right version of KSP, which would be 1.2.2 if you want RSS to work.
